mapper.insert: insert into pisp_waybill( WAYBILL_NO,INFO_ID,SHIPPER_UNIT, INFO_TYPE,PROCESS_TYPE,SHIPPER,HAULIER,SHIPPER_NAME,SHIPPER_PHONE,HAULIER_NAME,HAULIER_PHONE, PROTOCOL_PHOTO,STATUS,SEND_GOODS_DATE, REQUIRE_SERVICE,REMARK,SEND_GOODS_UNIT, SEND_GOODS_PERSON,SEND_GOODS_MOBILE, SEND_GOODS_ADDRESS,RECEIVE_GOODS_UNIT,RECEIVE_GOODS_PERSON, RECEIVE_GOODS_MOBILE,RECEIVE_GOODS_ADDRESS, TRANSACTION_TIME,USER_ID,CREATE_USER,CREATE_TIME, FROM_PLACE,FROM_P_CODE,FROM_C_CODE,FROM_T_CODE, TO_PLACE,TO_P_CODE,TO_C_CODE,TO_T_CODE,INFO_CONTENT,ORDER_STATUS ) values(#{waybillNo},#{infoId},#{shipperUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoType},#{processType},#{shipper}, #{haulier},#{shipperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shipperPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{haulierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{haulierPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{protocolPhoto},#{status}, #{sendGoodsDate},#{requireService},#{remark}, #{sendGoodsUnit},#{sendGoodsPerson},#{sendGoodsMobile}, #{sendGoodsAddress},#{receiveGoodsUnit}, #{receiveGoodsPerson},#{receiveGoodsMobile}, #{receiveGoodsAddress},#{transactionTime},#{userId}, #{createUser},#{createTime}, #{fromPlace},#{fromPCode},#{fromCCode},#{fromTCode}, #{toPlace},#{toPCode},#{toCCode},#{toTCode},#{infoContent},#{orderStatus} )
mapper.select:
SELECT w.WAYBILL_ID, w.WAYBILL_NO, w.FROM_PLACE, w.TO_PLACE, w.`STATUS`, w.CREATE_TIME, w.SEND_GOODS_DATE, w.PROCESS_TYPE, w.REMARK, w.INFO_ID, w.SEND_GOODS_UNIT, w.SEND_GOODS_PERSON, w.SEND_GOODS_MOBILE, w.SHIPPER_NAME, w.SHIPPER_PHONE, w.SHIPPER_UNIT, w.HAULIER_NAME, w.HAULIER_PHONE, pi.PUBLISH_ID FROM pisp_waybill w LEFT JOIN pisp_publish_info pi ON pi.INFO_TYPE = w.INFO_TYPE AND pi.INFO_ID = w.INFO_ID
AND w.HAULIER = #{haulier} AND w.SHIPPER = #{shipper} AND (w.SHIPPER = #{userId} OR w.HAULIER = #{userId}) AND w.STATUS = #{status} AND w.WAYBILL_NO like '%${waybillNo}%' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pisp_waybill_goods wg WHERE w.WAYBILL_NO = wg.WAYBILL_NO AND wg.GOODS_NAME LIKE '%${goodsName}%')

SELECT w.WAYBILL_ID, w.WAYBILL_NO, w.HAULIER, w.HAULIER_NAME, w.HAULIER_PHONE, w.SHIPPER, w.SHIPPER_NAME, w.SHIPPER_PHONE, w.INFO_CONTENT, w.PROCESS_TYPE, w.CREATE_TIME, w.PROTOCOL_PHOTO FROM pisp_waybill w WHERE w.`STATUS` = 99 AND w.PROCESS_TYPE != 1 AND w.SHIPPER = #{shipper} AND w.HAULIER = #{haulier} AND w.WAYBILL_NO LIKE '%${waybillNo}%' ORDER BY w.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT pw.WAYBILL_NO, pw.CREATE_TIME, pw.INFO_CONTENT, pw.HAULIER, pw.HAULIER_NAME, pw.HAULIER_PHONE, pw.PROTOCOL_PHOTO, pdl.LOCATION_NAME, pdl.LATITUDE, pdl.LONGITUDE, pdl.LOCATE_TIME FROM pisp_waybill pw LEFT JOIN pisp_driver_location pdl ON pdl.DRIVER = pw.HAULIER WHERE pw.WAYBILL_NO=#{waybillNo}

SELECT c.CAR_ID, c.CAR_NO, c.CAR_PHOTO, c.CAR_TYPE, dv1.VAL_NAME AS CAR_LENGTH_NAME, dv2.VAL_NAME AS CAR_TYPE_NAME, c.LOAD_WEIGHT FROM pisp_waybill_car pwc LEFT JOIN pisp_car c ON pwc.CAR_ID = c.CAR_ID LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val dv1 ON dv1.VAL_CODE = c.CAR_LENGTH AND dv1.DICT_CODE='CAR_LENGTH' LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val dv2 ON dv2.VAL_CODE = c.CAR_TYPE AND dv2.DICT_CODE='CAR_TYPE'
AND pwc.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo}

SELECT c.CAR_ID, c.CAR_NO, c.CAR_PHOTO, c.CAR_TYPE, c.CAR_LENGTH, c.DEFINE_CAR_TYPE, CASE WHEN c.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE IS NOT NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE IS NOT NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT( ct1.CARTYPE_NAME, '-', ct2.CARTYPE_NAME, '-', ct3.CARTYPE_NAME ) WHEN c.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE IS NOT NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE IS NOT NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE IS NULL THEN CONCAT( ct1.CARTYPE_NAME, '-', ct2.CARTYPE_NAME ) WHEN c.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE IS NOT NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE IS NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE IS NULL THEN ct1.CARTYPE_NAME WHEN c.CAR_TYPE IS NOT NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE IS NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE IS NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE IS NULL THEN pdv1.VAL_NAME WHEN c.CAR_TYPE IS NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE IS NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE IS NULL AND c.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE IS NULL THEN '' END AS CAR_TYPE_NAME, c.LOAD_WEIGHT FROM pisp_waybill_car pwc INNER JOIN pisp_car c ON pwc.CAR_ID = c.CAR_ID LEFT JOIN pisp_car_type_base_data ct1 ON ct1.CARTYPE_CODE = c.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE AND c.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN pisp_car_type_base_data ct2 ON ct2.CARTYPE_CODE = c.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE AND c.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN pisp_car_type_base_data ct3 ON ct3.CARTYPE_CODE = c.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE AND c.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val pdv1 ON pdv1.VAL_CODE = c.CAR_TYPE AND pdv1.DICT_CODE='CAR_TYPE'
AND pwc.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo}

SELECT pc.CAR_ID, pc.CAR_NO, pc.CAR_PHOTO, pc.LOAD_WEIGHT, pdv2.VAL_NAME AS CAR_LENGTH_NAME, pc.CAR_TYPE, CASE when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NOT NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NOT NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE is NOT NULL then CONCAT(ct1.CARTYPE_NAME,'-',ct2.CARTYPE_NAME,'-',ct3.CARTYPE_NAME) when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NOT NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NOT NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE IS NULL then CONCAT(ct1.CARTYPE_NAME,'-',ct2.CARTYPE_NAME) when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NOT NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE IS NULL then ct1.CARTYPE_NAME when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE is NULL AND pc.DEFINE_CAR_TYPE IS NOT NULL then pc.DEFINE_CAR_TYPE when pc.CAR_TYPE is not null then pdv1.VAL_NAME when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE is NULL AND pc.DEFINE_CAR_TYPE IS NULL then '' END as CAR_TYPE_NAME FROM pisp_waybill_car pwc INNER JOIN pisp_car pc ON pwc.CAR_ID = pc.CAR_ID LEFT JOIN pisp_car_type_base_data ct1 ON ct1.CARTYPE_CODE = pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE LEFT JOIN pisp_car_type_base_data ct2 ON ct2.CARTYPE_CODE = pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE LEFT JOIN pisp_car_type_base_data ct3 ON ct3.CARTYPE_CODE = pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val pdv1 ON pdv1.VAL_CODE = pc.CAR_TYPE AND pdv1.DICT_CODE='CAR_TYPE' LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val pdv2 ON pdv2.VAL_CODE = pc.CAR_LENGTH AND pdv2.DICT_CODE='CAR_LENGTH' WHERE pwc.WAYBILL_NO=#{waybillNo}

SELECT w.WAYBILL_ID, w.WAYBILL_NO, w.HAULIER, w.HAULIER_NAME, w.HAULIER_PHONE, w.CREATE_TIME, w.STATUS, w.INFO_CONTENT, u.IS_AUTH, gs.FROM_PLACE, gs.TO_PLACE, gs.WEIGHT, weightdict.VAL_NAME AS WEIGHT_UNIT, gs.VOLUME, volumedict.VAL_NAME AS VOLUME_UNIT, gs.CAR_LENGTH_NEED, gs.CAR_LENGTH_NEED_NAME AS CAR_LENGTH_NEED_NAME, gs.CAR_TYPE_NEED_NAME AS CAR_TYPE_NEED_NAME, gs.PRICE, pricedict.VAL_NAME AS PRICE_UNIT, gs.LINKMAN, gs.LINK_MOBILE1, gs.LINK_MOBILE2, gs.LINK_PHONE, gs.LOAD_DATE, gs.GOODS_NAME, gs.PLACE_KILOMETRE, dictType.VAL_NAME AS GOODS_TYPE, gs.MARK, pub.PUBLISH_TIME, gs.GOODS_CLASS, e.ENTERPRISE_NAME AS ENTERPRISE_NAME, pub.IS_STRUCT, e.ADDRESS, pub.PUBLISH_ID, pub.INFO_TYPE FROM pisp_waybill w LEFT JOIN pisp_publish_info pub ON w.INFO_ID = pub.INFO_ID and w.INFO_TYPE = pub.INFO_TYPE LEFT JOIN pisp_goods_source gs ON gs.GOODS_SOURCE_ID = pub.INFO_ID
LEFT JOIN pisp_user u ON u.USER_ID = pub.USER_ID
LEFT JOIN pisp_user u ON u.USER_ID = w.HAULIER
LEFT JOIN pisp_euser e ON e.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val weightdict ON weightdict.dict_code = 'GOODS_WEIGHT_UNIT' AND weightdict.val_code = gs.WEIGHT_UNIT LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val volumedict ON volumedict.dict_code = 'GOODS_WEIGHT_UNIT' AND volumedict.val_code = gs.VOLUME_UNIT LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val pricedict ON pricedict.dict_code = 'TRANSPORT_PRICE_UNIT' AND pricedict.val_code = gs.PRICE_UNIT LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val dictType ON dictType.dict_code = 'GOODS_TYPE' AND dictType.val_code = gs.goods_type WHERE w.STATUS != 99 AND w.PROCESS_TYPE = 1
and w.USER_ID =#{userId}
and w.INFO_ID = #{infoId} and w.INFO_TYPE = #{infoType}
ORDER BY w.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT w.WAYBILL_ID, w.WAYBILL_NO, w.HAULIER, w.HAULIER_NAME, w.HAULIER_PHONE, w.CREATE_TIME, w.STATUS, w.INFO_CONTENT, u.IS_AUTH, gs.FROM_PLACE, gs.TO_PLACE,
gs.LINKMAN, gs.LINK_MOBILE1, gs.LINK_MOBILE2, gs.LINK_PHONE,
pub.PUBLISH_TIME, gs.GOODS_CLASS,
pub.IS_STRUCT, pub.PUBLISH_ID, pub.INFO_TYPE FROM pisp_waybill w LEFT JOIN pisp_publish_info pub ON w.INFO_ID = pub.INFO_ID and w.INFO_TYPE = pub.INFO_TYPE LEFT JOIN pisp_goods_source gs ON gs.GOODS_SOURCE_ID = pub.INFO_ID
LEFT JOIN pisp_user u ON u.USER_ID = pub.USER_ID
LEFT JOIN pisp_user u ON u.USER_ID = w.HAULIER
WHERE w.STATUS != 99 AND w.PROCESS_TYPE = 1
and w.USER_ID =#{userId}
and w.INFO_ID = #{infoId} and w.INFO_TYPE = #{infoType}
ORDER BY w.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT
w.CREATE_TIME,
gs.WEIGHT, ( SELECT weightdict.VAL_NAME FROM pisp_dict_val weightdict WHERE weightdict.dict_code = 'GOODS_WEIGHT_UNIT' AND weightdict.val_code = gs.WEIGHT_UNIT ) AS WEIGHT_UNIT, gs.VOLUME, ( SELECT volumedict.VAL_NAME FROM pisp_dict_val volumedict WHERE volumedict.dict_code = 'GOODS_WEIGHT_UNIT' AND volumedict.val_code = gs.VOLUME_UNIT ) AS VOLUME_UNIT, gs.CAR_LENGTH_NEED, gs.CAR_LENGTH_NEED_NAME AS CAR_LENGTH_NEED_NAME, gs.CAR_TYPE_NEED_NAME AS CAR_TYPE_NEED_NAME, gs.PRICE, gs.DEFINE_CAR_TYPE, ( SELECT pricedict.VAL_NAME FROM pisp_dict_val pricedict WHERE pricedict.dict_code = 'TRANSPORT_PRICE_UNIT' AND pricedict.val_code = gs.PRICE_UNIT ) AS PRICE_UNIT,
gs.LINKMAN, gs.LINK_MOBILE1, gs.LINK_MOBILE2, gs.LINK_PHONE, gs.LOAD_DATE, gs.GOODS_NAME, gs.PLACE_KILOMETRE,
( SELECT dictType.VAL_NAME FROM pisp_dict_val dictType WHERE dictType.dict_code = 'GOODS_TYPE' AND dictType.val_code = gs.goods_type ) AS GOODS_TYPE, gs.MARK,
e.ENTERPRISE_NAME AS ENTERPRISE_NAME,
e.ADDRESS, pub.PUBLISH_ID
FROM pisp_waybill w INNER JOIN pisp_publish_info pub ON w.INFO_ID = pub.INFO_ID and w.INFO_TYPE = pub.INFO_TYPE INNER JOIN pisp_goods_source gs ON gs.GOODS_SOURCE_ID = pub.INFO_ID
INNER JOIN pisp_user u ON u.USER_ID = pub.USER_ID
INNER JOIN pisp_user u ON u.USER_ID = w.HAULIER
INNER JOIN pisp_euser e ON e.USER_ID = u.USER_ID
WHERE w.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo} ORDER BY w.CREATE_TIME DESC

if.test: waybillId != null or (waybillNo != null and waybillNo !='')

select.if:
SELECT w.WAYBILL_ID, w.WAYBILL_NO, w.USER_ID, w.INFO_ID, w.INFO_TYPE, w.INFO_CONTENT, w.PROCESS_TYPE, w.STATUS, w.ORDER_STATUS, w.SHIPPER, w.HAULIER, w.SHIPPER_NAME, w.SHIPPER_PHONE, w.SHIPPER_UNIT, w.HAULIER_NAME, w.HAULIER_PHONE, w.PROTOCOL_PHOTO, w.INSURANCE_PHOTO, w.SEND_GOODS_DATE, w.REQUIRE_SERVICE, w.REMARK, w.SEND_GOODS_UNIT, w.SEND_GOODS_PERSON, w.SEND_GOODS_MOBILE, w.FROM_PLACE, w.FROM_P_CODE, w.FROM_C_CODE, w.FROM_T_CODE, w.SEND_GOODS_ADDRESS, w.RECEIVE_GOODS_UNIT, w.RECEIVE_GOODS_PERSON, w.RECEIVE_GOODS_MOBILE, w.TO_PLACE, w.TO_P_CODE, w.TO_C_CODE, w.TO_T_CODE, w.RECEIVE_GOODS_ADDRESS, w.TRANSACTION_TIME, w.CREATE_USER, w.CREATE_TIME, w.UPDATE_USER, w.UPDATE_TIME, w.ADVANCE_PRICE, w.MID_PRICE, w.FINAL_PRICE FROM pisp_waybill w
AND w.WAYBILL_ID = #{waybillId} AND w.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo}

mapper.select:
SELECT w.INFO_CONTENT, w.WAYBILL_ID, w.WAYBILL_NO, w.HAULIER_NAME, w.HAULIER_PHONE, w.CREATE_TIME, w.SHIPPER_NAME, w.SHIPPER_PHONE, w.PROCESS_TYPE FROM pisp_waybill w
w.PROCESS_TYPE !=1 AND w.`STATUS` != 99 AND w.HAULIER = #{haulier} AND w.SHIPPER = #{shipper} AND w.WAYBILL_NO like '%${waybillNo}%'
ORDER BY w.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT w.WAYBILL_NO, w.INFO_CONTENT, w.CREATE_TIME, w.TRANSACTION_TIME, w.SHIPPER_NAME, w.SHIPPER_PHONE, w.SHIPPER_UNIT, w.HAULIER_NAME, w.HAULIER_PHONE FROM pisp_waybill w
AND (w.SHIPPER = #{userId} OR w.HAULIER = #{userId})
AND w.STATUS = #{status} AND w.STATUS != 99
AND DATE(w.CREATE_TIME) >= DATE(#{createTimeStart})
AND DATE(w.CREATE_TIME) <= DATE(#{createTimeEnd})
AND DATE(w.TRANSACTION_TIME) >= DATE(#{transactionTimeStart})
AND DATE(w.TRANSACTION_TIME) <= DATE(#{transactionTimeEnd})

SELECT pc.CAR_ID, pc.CAR_NO, pc.CAR_PHOTO, pc.CAR_TYPE, dv1.VAL_NAME AS CAR_LENGTH_NAME, CASE when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NOT NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NOT NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE is NOT NULL then CONCAT(ct1.CARTYPE_NAME,'-',ct2.CARTYPE_NAME,'-',ct3.CARTYPE_NAME) when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NOT NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NOT NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE is NULL then CONCAT(ct1.CARTYPE_NAME,'-',ct2.CARTYPE_NAME) when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NOT NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE is NULL then ct1.CARTYPE_NAME when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE is NULL AND pc.DEFINE_CAR_TYPE is not null then pc.DEFINE_CAR_TYPE when pc.CAR_TYPE is not null then pdv.VAL_NAME when pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE is NULL and pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE is NULL AND pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE is NULL AND pc.DEFINE_CAR_TYPE is null then '' END as CAR_TYPE_NAME, pc.LOAD_WEIGHT FROM pisp_waybill_car pwc LEFT JOIN pisp_car pc ON pwc.CAR_ID = pc.CAR_ID LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val dv1 ON dv1.VAL_CODE = pc.CAR_LENGTH AND dv1.DICT_CODE='CAR_LENGTH' LEFT JOIN pisp_car_type_base_data ct1 ON ct1.CARTYPE_CODE = pc.CAR_TYPE_FIRST_CODE LEFT JOIN pisp_car_type_base_data ct2 ON ct2.CARTYPE_CODE = pc.CAR_TYPE_SECOND_CODE LEFT JOIN pisp_car_type_base_data ct3 ON ct3.CARTYPE_CODE = pc.CAR_TYPE_THIRD_CODE LEFT JOIN pisp_dict_val pdv ON pdv.VAL_CODE = pc.CAR_TYPE AND pdv.DICT_CODE = 'CAR_TYPE'
AND pwc.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo}

SELECT ppi.PUBLISH_ID, w.WAYBILL_ID, w.INFO_ID, w.WAYBILL_NO, w.HAULIER, w.HAULIER_NAME, w.HAULIER_PHONE, w.CREATE_TIME, w.STATUS, w.ORDER_STATUS, w.INFO_CONTENT, w.IS_FINAL_PAY FROM pisp_waybill w INNER JOIN pisp_publish_info ppi ON w.INFO_ID = ppi.INFO_ID WHERE w.STATUS = 11 AND w.PROCESS_TYPE = 1 AND (w.ORDER_STATUS = 11 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = -1 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = -2 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = -41 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = -51 OR w.ORDER_STATUS IS NULL) AND w.INFO_ID = #{infoId} and w.INFO_TYPE = #{infoType} ORDER BY w.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT pwb.WAYBILL_NO, pwb.INFO_CONTENT, pwb.HAULIER, pwb.HAULIER_NAME, pwb.HAULIER_PHONE, pwb.ORDER_STATUS, gs.FROM_PLACE, gs.TO_PLACE, gs.GOODS_CLASS, pwb.INFO_ID, pwb.IS_E_EVALUATED, pwb.STATUS, pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY FROM pisp_waybill pwb LEFT JOIN pisp_publish_info pub ON pub.INFO_ID = pwb.INFO_ID AND pub.INFO_TYPE = pwb.INFO_TYPE LEFT JOIN pisp_goods_source gs ON gs.GOODS_SOURCE_ID = pwb.INFO_ID AND pwb.INFO_TYPE = 1
AND (pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 21 OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 22 OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 23 OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 24 OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 25)
AND (pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 30 OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 31 OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 32 OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 33 OR (pwb.STATUS = 11 AND pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 30 AND pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY = 1) OR (pwb.STATUS = 99 AND pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 99 AND pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33)OR (pwb.STATUS = 99 AND pwb.ORDER_STATUS = -61 AND pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33) OR pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33)
AND pwb.STATUS = #{orderStatus} AND (pwb.ORDER_STATUS = -61 OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus} OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS IS NULL ) AND pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY != 33
AND pwb.STATUS = #{orderStatus} AND (pwb.ORDER_STATUS = -61 OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus} OR pwb.ORDER_STATUS IS NULL ) AND (pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33 OR pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY = 99 OR pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY = 0)
AND pwb.STATUS = #{status}
AND (pwb.STATUS = #{status} OR (pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33 AND pwb.ORDER_STATUS = 99) OR (pwb.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33 AND pwb.ORDER_STATUS = -61))
AND pwb.SHIPPER = #{shipper} AND pwb.PROCESS_TYPE = #{processType} AND pwb.IS_E_EVALUATED = #{isEEvaluated}
ORDER BY pwb.UPDATE_TIME DESC

SELECT pw.WAYBILL_NO, pw.INFO_CONTENT, pw.PLACE_ORDER_TIME, pw.FROM_PLACE, pw.TO_PLACE, pw.SHIPPER, pw.HAULIER, pw.HAULIER_NAME, pw.HAULIER_PHONE, pw.ORDER_STATUS, pw.PROTOCOL_PHOTO, pw.INSURANCE_PHOTO, pw.TRANSACTION_TIME, pdl.LONGITUDE, pdl.LATITUDE, pdl.LOCATION_NAME, pdl.LOCATE_TIME, pw.IS_E_EVALUATED, pw.RECEIVE_TIME, pw.MID_PRICE, pw.FINAL_PRICE, pu.WAYBILL_MONEY, pw.TRANSATION_PRICE, pw.IS_FINAL_PAY FROM pisp_waybill pw LEFT JOIN pisp_driver_location pdl ON pw.USER_ID = pdl.DRIVER INNER JOIN pisp_user pu ON pw.SHIPPER = pu.USER_ID WHERE pw.WAYBILL_NO=#{waybillNo}

SELECT w.WAYBILL_NO, w.INFO_ID, w.SHIPPER, w.SHIPPER_NAME, w.SHIPPER_PHONE, w.STATUS, w.INFO_CONTENT, w.ORDER_STATUS, gs.FROM_PLACE, gs.TO_PLACE, gs.GOODS_CLASS, gs.LINKMAN, gs.LINK_MOBILE1, gs.LINK_MOBILE2, w.IS_P_EVALUATED, w.IS_FINAL_PAY FROM pisp_waybill w LEFT JOIN pisp_goods_source gs ON gs.GOODS_SOURCE_ID = w.INFO_ID WHERE w.USER_ID = #{userId} AND w.PROCESS_TYPE = 1
AND w.STATUS = 11 AND (w.ORDER_STATUS = -1 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = -2 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 11 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = -42 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = -52 OR w.ORDER_STATUS IS NULL)
AND (w.ORDER_STATUS = 20 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 21 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 22 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 23 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 24 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 25)
AND (w.ORDER_STATUS = 30 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 31 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 32 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 33 OR (w.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33 AND w.ORDER_STATUS = 99)OR (w.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33 AND w.ORDER_STATUS = -62 AND w.STATUS = 99))
AND (w.ORDER_STATUS = 30 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 31 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 32 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = 33 OR w.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33) AND w.STATUS != 99
AND w.STATUS = #{orderStatus} AND (w.ORDER_STATUS =-62 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus} OR w.ORDER_STATUS IS NULL) AND (w.IS_FINAL_PAY = 99 OR w.IS_FINAL_PAY = 0)
AND w.STATUS = #{orderStatus} AND (w.ORDER_STATUS =-62 OR w.ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus} OR w.ORDER_STATUS IS NULL) AND (W.IS_FINAL_PAY = 33 OR w.IS_FINAL_PAY = 99 OR w.IS_FINAL_PAY = 0)
AND w.STATUS = #{status}
AND (w.ORDER_STATUS != -3 AND w.ORDER_STATUS != -41 AND w.ORDER_STATUS != -51 AND w.ORDER_STATUS != -61 AND w.ORDER_STATUS != -6 OR w.ORDER_STATUS IS NULL)
AND w.IS_P_EVALUATED = #{isPEvaluated}
ORDER BY w.UPDATE_TIME DESC
ORDER BY w.CREATE_TIME DESC
ORDER BY IFNULL(w.UPDATE_TIME,w.CREATE_TIME) DESC

select pw.WAYBILL_ID, pw.WAYBILL_NO, pw.INFO_ID, pw.CREATE_TIME, pw.PROTOCOL_PHOTO, pw.INSURANCE_PHOTO, pw.ORDER_STATUS, pe.LINKMAN, pe.LINK_MOBILE1, pe.LINK_MOBILE2, pe.ENTERPRISE_NAME, pe.ADDRESS, pe.ENTERPRISE_PHOTO, pp.PUBLISH_TIME, pw.PLACE_ORDER_TIME, pw.TRANSACTION_TIME, pw.SHIPPER, pw.HAULIER, pw.INFO_CONTENT, pw.IS_P_EVALUATED, pw.STATUS, pw.FROM_PLACE, pw.TO_PLACE, pw.RECEIVE_TIME, pw.IS_FINAL_PAY FROM pisp_waybill pw INNER JOIN pisp_publish_info pp ON pw.INFO_ID = pp.INFO_ID INNER JOIN pisp_user pu ON pw.SHIPPER = pu.USER_ID INNER JOIN pisp_euser pe ON pu.USER_ID = pe.USER_ID where pw.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo}
